### Getting Started

#### Install and Launch R Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse)
```
:::


Note that the KML file downloaded on data.gov is corrupted or is not working in some way. Hence, we will use st_write.

Note that the difference of WGS 84 and svy21

R is case sensitive .


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata <- read.csv('data/respopagesextod2023.csv')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata %>% 
  group_by(PA,SZ,AG) %>%
  summarise(`POP` = sum(`Pop`)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = AG,
              values_from = POP)

colnames(popdata2023)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "PA"          "SZ"          "0_to_4"      "10_to_14"    "15_to_19"   
 [6] "20_to_24"    "25_to_29"    "30_to_34"    "35_to_39"    "40_to_44"   
[11] "45_to_49"    "50_to_54"    "55_to_59"    "5_to_9"      "60_to_64"   
[16] "65_to_69"    "70_to_74"    "75_to_79"    "80_to_84"    "85_to_89"   
[21] "90_and_Over"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata %>% 
  group_by(PA,SZ,AG) %>%
  summarise(`POP` = sum(`Pop`)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = AG,
              values_from = POP)%>%
  mutate(YOUNG = rowSums(.[3:6])
         +rowSums(.[14])) %>%
mutate(`ECONOMY ACTIVE` = rowSums(.[7:13])+
rowSums(.[15]))%>%
mutate(`AGED`=rowSums(.[16:21])) %>%
mutate(`TOTAL`=rowSums(.[3:21])) %>%  
mutate(`DEPENDENCY` = (`YOUNG` + `AGED`)
/`ECONOMY ACTIVE`) %>%
  select(`PA`, `SZ`, `YOUNG`, 
       `ECONOMY ACTIVE`, `AGED`, 
       `TOTAL`, `DEPENDENCY`)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata2023 %>%
  mutate_at(.vars = vars(PA, SZ), 
          .funs = list(toupper)) %>%
  filter(`ECONOMY ACTIVE` > 0)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
head(popdata2023)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 6 × 7
  PA         SZ                    YOUNG `ECONOMY ACTIVE`  AGED TOTAL DEPENDENCY
  <chr>      <chr>                 <dbl>            <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>      <dbl>
1 ANG MO KIO ANG MO KIO TOWN CENT…  1240             2830   890  4960      0.753
2 ANG MO KIO CHENG SAN              5150            15600  6580 27330      0.752
3 ANG MO KIO CHONG BOON             4620            14120  7060 25800      0.827
4 ANG MO KIO KEBUN BAHRU            4320            12400  5640 22360      0.803
5 ANG MO KIO SEMBAWANG HILLS        1840             3670  1420  6930      0.888
6 ANG MO KIO SHANGRI-LA             3810             9600  4320 17730      0.847
```


:::
:::


See below for the joins


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_shp = st_read(dsn = "./data/", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\zcchong\IS415\In-Class_Ex\In-Class_Ex02\data' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_write(mpsz14_shp, "data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml",delete_dsn = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Deleting source `data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml' using driver `KML'
Writing layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' to data source 
  `data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml' using driver `KML'
Writing 323 features with 15 fields and geometry type Multi Polygon.
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_kml = st_read('data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\zcchong\IS415\In-Class_Ex\In-Class_Ex02\data\MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml' 
  using driver `KML'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz19_kml = st_read('data/MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `URA_MP19_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL' from data source 
  `C:\zcchong\IS415\In-Class_Ex\In-Class_Ex02\data\MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml' 
  using driver `KML'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY, XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz19_shp = st_read(dsn = "./data/", layer = "MPSZ-2019") %>%
    st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MPSZ-2019' from data source 
  `C:\zcchong\IS415\In-Class_Ex\In-Class_Ex02\data' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 6 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
preschool = st_read('data/PreSchoolsLocation.kml')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `PRESCHOOLS_LOCATION' from data source 
  `C:\zcchong\IS415\In-Class_Ex\In-Class_Ex02\data\PreSchoolsLocation.kml' 
  using driver `KML'

z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0

```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_crs(mpsz19_shp)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Coordinate Reference System:
  User input: EPSG:3414 
  wkt:
PROJCRS["SVY21 / Singapore TM",
    BASEGEOGCRS["SVY21",
        DATUM["SVY21",
            ELLIPSOID["WGS 84",6378137,298.257223563,
                LENGTHUNIT["metre",1]]],
        PRIMEM["Greenwich",0,
            ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],
        ID["EPSG",4757]],
    CONVERSION["Singapore Transverse Mercator",
        METHOD["Transverse Mercator",
            ID["EPSG",9807]],
        PARAMETER["Latitude of natural origin",1.36666666666667,
            ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433],
            ID["EPSG",8801]],
        PARAMETER["Longitude of natural origin",103.833333333333,
            ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433],
            ID["EPSG",8802]],
        PARAMETER["Scale factor at natural origin",1,
            SCALEUNIT["unity",1],
            ID["EPSG",8805]],
        PARAMETER["False easting",28001.642,
            LENGTHUNIT["metre",1],
            ID["EPSG",8806]],
        PARAMETER["False northing",38744.572,
            LENGTHUNIT["metre",1],
            ID["EPSG",8807]]],
    CS[Cartesian,2],
        AXIS["northing (N)",north,
            ORDER[1],
            LENGTHUNIT["metre",1]],
        AXIS["easting (E)",east,
            ORDER[2],
            LENGTHUNIT["metre",1]],
    USAGE[
        SCOPE["Cadastre, engineering survey, topographic mapping."],
        AREA["Singapore - onshore and offshore."],
        BBOX[1.13,103.59,1.47,104.07]],
    ID["EPSG",3414]]
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pop2023_mpsz <- left_join(popdata2023, mpsz19_shp,
                          by = c("SZ" = "SUBZONE_N"))
```
:::
